text:
Ref. No.: 479/Acad./2025
Date : 14.08.2025
NOTICE
Honours Degree Course Selection
B.Tech. Third Year & Final Year students who are enrolled in Honours degree program have to register
for courses in the ODD Semester 2025-26. Honours degree courses should be chosen from the department
in which the student enrolled. Students can fill the attached course selection form and forward by
respective Head of the Department latest by 19-08-2025.
(Nand Kishore)
Assistant Dean, Academic Affairs
Honours Degree Course Selection Form (2025-26)
(i) Name of the student:
(ii) Roll Number of the student:
(iii) Department Name:
(iv) Year in which currently enrolled:
(v) Semester in which currently enrolled:
List of Courses selected in this semester-
Sl. Name of the Subject Subject Code Credit
No.
(i) 1
(ii) 2
(iii) 3
(iv) 4
